languages.text: "Всеотец. Расс. Мои братья. Я принадлежу им. Я — их клинок. И этот клинок не сломается никогда".
"The Allfather. Russ. My brothers. I belong to them. I am their blade. And this blade will never break."
languages.original_text: "Всеотец. Расс. Мои братья. Я принадлежу им. Я — их клинок. И этот клинок не сломается никогда".

traits.locale_text: "The Allfather. Russ. My brothers. I belong to them. I am their blade. And this blade will never break."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Allfather. Russ. My brothers. I belong to them. I am their blade. And this blade will never break."

languages.text: « Le Père de Tous. Russ. Mes frères. Nous formons un tout. Je suis leur lame. Et jamais je ne me briserai. »
languages.original_text: "The Allfather. Russ. My brothers. I belong to them. I am their blade. And this blade will never break."

traits.locale_text: « Le Père de Tous. Russ. Mes frères. Nous formons un tout. Je suis leur lame. Et jamais je ne me briserai. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我要为了全父，为了鲁斯，为了我的兄弟而战。我属于他们，我是他们的利刃，这把利刃永远不会折断。”
languages.original_text: "The Allfather. Russ. My brothers. I belong to them. I am their blade. And this blade will never break."

traits.locale_text: “我要为了全父，为了鲁斯，为了我的兄弟而战。我属于他们，我是他们的利刃，这把利刃永远不会折断。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「全知の父、ラス。俺の兄弟たち。俺は彼らのものであり、剣だ。この剣は決して折れない」
languages.original_text: "The Allfather. Russ. My brothers. I belong to them. I am their blade. And this blade will never break."

traits.locale_text: 「全知の父、ラス。俺の兄弟たち。俺は彼らのものであり、剣だ。この剣は決して折れない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Der Allvater. Russ. Meine Brüder. Ich gehöre ihnen. Ich bin ihre Klinge. Und diese Klinge wird niemals zerbrechen."
languages.original_text: "The Allfather. Russ. My brothers. I belong to them. I am their blade. And this blade will never break."

traits.locale_text: "Der Allvater. Russ. Meine Brüder. Ich gehöre ihnen. Ich bin ihre Klinge. Und diese Klinge wird niemals zerbrechen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «El Padre de Todo. Russ. Mis hermanos. Mi sitio está con ellos. Soy su espada. Y esta espada no se quebrará jamás».
languages.original_text: "The Allfather. Russ. My brothers. I belong to them. I am their blade. And this blade will never break."

traits.locale_text: «El Padre de Todo. Russ. Mis hermanos. Mi sitio está con ellos. Soy su espada. Y esta espada no se quebrará jamás».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yücebaba. Russ. Kardeşlerim. Benim yerim, onların yanı. Ben onların kılıcıyım. Bu kılıç ki asla kırılmayacak."
languages.original_text: "The Allfather. Russ. My brothers. I belong to them. I am their blade. And this blade will never break."

traits.locale_text: "Yücebaba. Russ. Kardeşlerim. Benim yerim onların yanı. Ben onların kılıcıyım. Bu kılıç ki asla kırılmayacak."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
